amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike Section 108 in Division E that prohibits any funding from being used for border security infrastructure along the southern border.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 64 printed in Part A of House Report 116-111 to strike Section 108 in Division E that prohibits any funding being used for border security infrastructure along the southern border.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A115) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 237 (Roll no. 359).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A115) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 237 (Roll no. 359).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A115) offered by Mr. Burgess.
